content: New Airdrop: ZkHarvest (ZKH)The rewards: $5000 in $ZHK TokensFor completing all tasks: $5 in $ZHK TokensReferral: YesRate: ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©Focus: 800 [FCFS and Random] participants who completed all the tasks without exception will receive $5 in $ZHK Tokens eachTop 10 referrals will receive $100 in $ZHK Tokens eachAirdrop Link: Airdrop page‚ñ´Ô∏èFollow ZkHarvest on Twitter and Retweet this Tweet‚ñ´Ô∏èRetweet this Tweet and @Tag 3 Friends and HashTag #ZkHarvest #Airdrop #zkSyncEra #zkSync #EventLab‚ñ´Ô∏èJoin Event Lab Fans Channel‚ñ´Ô∏èFollow ZkHarvest on Discord‚ñ´Ô∏èSubmit your zkSync Era Mainnet wallet address in the Airdrop pageNote: Airdrop ends on 28 May Additional Information: Zk-Harvest offers a set of tools essential to a growing decentralized ecosystemOur goal is to create a synergy between the projects that are currently developing on Zk Sync, we will try to collaborate with them as soon as a trusting partnership can be created.Website | DocsIn what clearly looks like a multi-blockchain future with a very divided community, we are committed to building synergy between Zk Sync projects so that the community can extract the maximum benefit from them in the easiest way possible.Disclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any airdrop project, also airdrop is 100% free.
